contents.text: Welcome to Say Media in San Francisco, where we power consumer media innovation through our Tempest publishing platform.
To speak with our sales team, press 1.
For a platform demo and overview, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you with a Say Media sales representative for a Tempest demo.

navigationGoals: I want to schedule a demo of the Tempest platform with a sales representative.
I want to schedule a demo of the Tempest platform to see how I could publish my veteran stories.
Schedule a deep-dive demo of the Tempest publishing platform, focusing on its CMS architecture and API integration capabilities.
I’d like someone to walk me step-by-step through using the Tempest publishing platform features.
I'd like to schedule a comprehensive demo of the Tempest platform to evaluate its capabilities.

contents.text: For pricing, subscription, and billing questions, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you with our pricing and subscription specialist.

navigationGoals: I need detailed pricing and subscription options for the Tempest platform.
I need details on Tempest subscription plans and whether there’s a discount for veterans.
Inquire about subscription tiers, API call quotas, and overage pricing for the Tempest enterprise plan.
I want to ask about the different subscription plans and pricing details for Tempest.
Could you provide me with the details on Tempest's subscription plans and pricing structure?

contents.text: For technical support with Tempest, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you with our technical support team.

navigationGoals: I need help troubleshooting a technical issue with the Tempest platform.
I’m having trouble logging into Tempest to upload my blog post; I need technical assistance.
Troubleshoot a 500 Internal Server Error in my Tempest API integration when pushing content, including OAuth token refresh issues.
I’m having trouble with the platform’s technical functions and need help resolving an issue.
I'm experiencing technical difficulties uploading content to Tempest and need support troubleshooting the issue.

contents.text: For billing and account inquiries, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you with our billing department.

navigationGoals: I want to review my billing statement and update my payment method.
I want to update my billing information and review recent charges on my account.
Update my credit card on file and obtain a detailed invoice with line-item breakdown of my Tempest usage charges.
I need assistance understanding my recent bill and how to update my payment information.
I want to review my latest invoice and confirm the status of my billing account.
